</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 169 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dragon Disciple](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=56)

[Shape of the Dragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=1947)

---

You've practiced and increased your draconic might, allowing you to take your draconic form more often. You can use [Shape of the Dragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=1947) once per hour instead of once per day.
